trans-unit.source: Represents a security token handler that creates security tokens from SAML 1.1 Assertions.
trans-unit.target: 表示會從 SAML 1.1 判斷提示建立安全性權杖的安全性權杖處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityTokenHandler> class serializes and deserializes security tokens backed by SAML 1.1 Assertions into <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityTokenHandler>類別序列化和還原序列化安全性權杖的 SAML 1.1 判斷提示到<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>物件。

trans-unit.source: Security token handlers are responsible for creating, reading, writing, and validating tokens.
trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖處理常式負責建立、 讀取、 寫入和驗證權杖。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a security token service (STS) or relying party (RP) application to process SAML 1.1 Assertion-backed security tokens by adding an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityTokenHandler> class to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection> object configured for the service (or application).
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定安全性權杖服務 (STS) 或信賴憑證者 (RP) 應用程式處理 SAML 1.1 判斷提示為基礎的安全性權杖所加入的執行個體<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityTokenHandler>類別<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection>設定服務 （或應用程式） 的物件。

trans-unit.source: This can be done either programmatically or in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這可以透過程式設計方式或在組態檔中完成。

trans-unit.source: The handler itself is configured from the configuration specified for the collection through the collection’s <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection.Configuration%2A> property when it is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合的集合針對指定的設定會設定處理常式本身<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection.Configuration%2A>屬性加入至集合時。

trans-unit.source: While it is possible to configure the handler individually by setting its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property, this is not normally necessary; however, if the handler must be configured individually, the property should be set after the handler is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以藉由設定個別設定的處理常式其<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A>屬性，這不是通常需要; 不過，如果處理常式必須在個別的設定，屬性應設定之後，處理常式加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: For many scenarios, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityTokenHandler> class can be used as-is; however, the class provides many extension points through the methods it exposes.
trans-unit.target: 以許多情形來說<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityTokenHandler>類別可用來當做-; 不過，這個類別會提供許多擴充點透過方法它公開。

trans-unit.source: By deriving from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityTokenHandler> and overriding specific methods, you can modify the functionality of the token processing provided in the default implementation, or you can add processing for extensions to the SAML Assertion specification that may be needed in some custom scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 由衍生自<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityTokenHandler>和覆寫特定方法時，您可以修改的預設實作中，在提供的權杖處理功能，或加入可能需要在 Saml 規格的延伸模組的處理某些自訂的情況。

trans-unit.source: Collects attributes with a common claim type, claim value type, and original issuer into a single attribute with multiple values.

trans-unit.target: 在輸入集合中與其他屬性共用通用宣告型別、宣告或原始簽發者的屬性會在輸出集合中合併成具有多個值的單一屬性。

trans-unit.source: The address is modeled as an AudienceRestriction condition.
trans-unit.target: 將位址模式化 AudienceRestriction 條件。

trans-unit.target: 權杖描述元。

trans-unit.source: Creates the conditions for the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 建立判斷提示的條件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions" /> object that contains the conditions for the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 包含判斷提示條件的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Generally, conditions should be included in assertions to limit the impact of misuse of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，條件應該包含在限制的誤用，判斷提示之影響的判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions can limit the period of vulnerability in the case of a compromised assertion.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 條件可以限制的弱點可能會在受到危害的判斷提示的情況下的期間。

trans-unit.source: The AudienceRestrictionCondition can be used to explicitly state the intended relying party or parties of the assertion, which coupled with appropriate audience restriction enforcement at relying parties can help to mitigate spoofing attacks between relying parties.
trans-unit.target: AudienceRestrictionCondition 可用來明確指定預定的信賴憑證者合作對象，或判斷提示，搭配適當的對象限制強制在信賴憑證者的合作對象之合作對象可以幫助減輕信賴憑證者之間的詐騙攻擊合作對象。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation creates NotBefore and NotOnOrAfter conditions based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A> property of the `tokenDescriptor`.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會建立為基礎的 NotBefore 和 NotOnOrAfter 條件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Lifetime%2A>屬性`tokenDescriptor`。

trans-unit.source: It will also generate an AudienceRestrictionCondition limiting consumption of the assertion to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.AppliesToAddress%2A> property of the `tokenDescriptor`.
trans-unit.target: 它也會產生限制的判斷提示來取用 AudienceRestrictionCondition<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.AppliesToAddress%2A>屬性`tokenDescriptor`。

trans-unit.target: 安全性權杖描述元，要從其中建立新的主體。

trans-unit.target: 從表示動作項目之 SAML 1.1 屬性的集合中建置 XML 格式化字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns the SAML11 authentication method identifier that matches the specified normalized value for a SAML authentication method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 SAML11 驗證方法識別項，該識別項符合 SAML 驗證方法的指定標準化值。

trans-unit.source: The SAML11 authentication method identifier (URI) that matches the specified normalized identifier.
trans-unit.target: 符合指定正規化識別項的 SAML11 驗證方法識別項 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: If no matching SAML11 authentication method is found, the <paramref name="normalizedAuthenticationType" /> URI is returned unaltered.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到相符的 SAML11 驗證方法，會原封不動地傳回 <paramref name="normalizedAuthenticationType" /> URI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityTokenHandler.DenormalizeAuthenticationType%2A> method returns the SAML11 authentication method identifier that matches the specified normalized URI.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityTokenHandler.DenormalizeAuthenticationType%2A>方法會傳回符合指定的 SAML11 驗證方法識別項正規化 URI。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AuthenticationMethods.X509> is specified for `normalizedAuthenticationType`, the following URI is returned: `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:X509-PKI`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AuthenticationMethods.X509>指定`normalizedAuthenticationType`，下列 URI 會傳回： `urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:X509-PKI`。

trans-unit.source: If a mapping does not exist for `normalizedAuthenticationType`, it is returned unaltered.
trans-unit.target: 如果對應不存在的`normalizedAuthenticationType`，它會原封不動地傳回。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" /> that represents the SAML 1.1 security token (the token should be of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" />) to be checked.
trans-unit.target: 表示要檢查之 SAML 1.1 安全性權杖 (權杖的類型應為 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" />) 的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken" />。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the specified token already exists in the token replay cache; otherwise the token is added to the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果語彙基元重新執行快取中已存在指定的語彙基元，會擲回例外狀況，否則語彙基元會加入至快取。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior is to only check bearer tokens (tokens that do not have keys).
trans-unit.target: 預設行為是只檢查持有者權杖 （沒有索引鍵的語彙基元）。

trans-unit.source: The token replay cache is the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.Caches%2A> object configured for this handler through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration.TokenReplayCacheExpirationPeriod*> property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerConfiguration> object referenced through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler.Configuration%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method returns the NotOnOrAfter of the SAML Condition if present.

trans-unit.source: If that value does not exist, it returns the NotOnOrAfter of the first SubjectConfirmationData.
trans-unit.target: 如果該值不存在，它會傳回第一個 SubjectConfirmationData 的 NotOnOrAfter。

trans-unit.source: This function will never return a value further from the current time (<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>) than Configuration.TokenReplayCacheExpirationPeriod.
trans-unit.target: 此函式永遠不會傳回值的目前時間之間的距離越遠 (<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>) 比 Configuration.TokenReplayCacheExpirationPeriod。

trans-unit.source: The issuer of the claim.

trans-unit.source: This method gets called when a special type of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute" /> is detected.
trans-unit.target: 當偵測到一種特殊型別的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute" />，就會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute" /> passed in wraps a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute" /> that contains a collection of attribute values (in the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute.Values" /> property), each of which will get mapped to a claim.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute" /> 透過包裝傳遞 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute" />，其包含屬性值集合 (在 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute.Values" /> 屬性中)，其中每一個將對應到宣告。

trans-unit.source: All of the claims will be returned in an <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity" /> with the specified issuer.
trans-unit.target: 所有宣告都會在 <see cref="T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity" /> 中與指定的簽發者一起傳回。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute" /> does not contain any valid attribute values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttribute" /> 不包含任何有效的屬性值。

trans-unit.target: 與這個處理常式相關聯的目前 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" />。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the resolved security token if a token was successfully resolved.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，如果已成功解析權杖，會包含已解析的安全性權杖。

trans-unit.source: Resolves the Signing Key Identifier to a SecurityToken.
trans-unit.target: 將簽署金鑰識別碼解析為 SecurityToken。

trans-unit.source: The token may not be valid for a number of reasons.
trans-unit.target: 語彙基元不可能適用於多種原因所造成。

trans-unit.source: For example, the current time may not be within the token's validity period, the token may contain data that is contradictory or not valid, or the token may contain unsupported SAML 1.1 elements.
trans-unit.target: 例如，權杖的有效期間內可能不到目前的時間、 語彙基元可能包含資料，又或無效，或語彙基元可能包含不支援的 SAML 1.1 項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There are no statements and no subject in the assertion specified by <paramref name="data" />.
trans-unit.target: 沒有陳述式，並且<paramref name="data" />所指定的判斷提示中沒有主旨。

trans-unit.source: (Both the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Subject" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Statements" /> property are <see langword="null" />.) If an assertion does not contain statements, it must contain a subject.
trans-unit.target: (<see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Subject" /> 屬性和 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Statements" /> 屬性都是 <see langword="null" />)。如果判斷提示不包含陳述式，它必須包含主體。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The assertion specified by <paramref name="assertion" /> contains an authentication, attribute, or authorization decision statement and no subject—these statements require a subject.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assertion" /> 指定的判斷提示包含驗證、屬性或授權決策陳述式，並沒有主旨--這些陳述式需要主旨。

trans-unit.source: (The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Statements" /> property contains a statement of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" />, or <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement" /> and the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Subject" /> property is <see langword="null" />).
trans-unit.target: (<see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Statements" /> 屬性包含型別為 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAttributeStatement" />、<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement" /> 的陳述式，而且 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion.Subject" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />)。
